attributes.contentHtml: There are some members who try to threaten and ban people without any reason..The owner ()Dream X Legend) is biggest scammer who belived in some people and..around 200 members are banned every 1 m0nth..i know many people who have been banned..There is a team which includes some members..but i dont want to name them.. It is a a network of server..The main server Dream Network and there are multple server based on same purpouse and same scam..It includes Legend,Naman,Nafay,Phoqus,GalaxyMan and many others

attributes.title: Dream Network Team ,Owner and other members are scam
